file_content.text: Ack... argh....
Here they are now. A squad barely half the size of your own. Pathetic.
Please, my lord... Republic sent special forces... couldn't hold them back--
Another chance, my lord... you'll need us.... The Republic's agent... too powerful--
One Jedi against a member of the Dark Council? I'm insulted.
I see very few Republic soldiers and a worm making excuses.
I watched an Imperial fall to a common mercenary. I have no desire to see it again.
Soldiers are often more trouble than they're worth. You deserve better from your opponents.
You'll make good practice for my fight with the Emperor.
You're no better.
The Emperor is more powerful than you or I can imagine.
Your men were fighting for their lives.
They did their best.
Perhaps if they had fought for the Empire, they would have survived.
Maybe it's time for the Empire to surrender.
They can't beat me.
Military standards mean nothing. You face the Dark Council now.
Not his fault I'm good at what I do.
I still had fun.
Your only advantage is complete ignorance of the dangers you face.
That was harsh.
The fate of Corellia hangs in the balance. Mistakes cannot be tolerated.
I want access to the Ion Wall controls.
No more games.
The Republic did well to send you here. If activated, the Ion Wall would disable ships, artillery, even the weapon in your hand.
But your contact should have told you that the Ion Wall cannot be destroyed through the controls alone.
I'm going to use it on the Empire instead.
That's not the plan.
Impossible. And you won't live to try.
[Lie] What contact?
You should pray the Republic can protect its spy better than you have.
You've wasted enough of the Republic's time.
Enough talk. [Attack]
An easy mistake when they have so little of it left.
The Republic will fall. The Dark Council will see to it.
